name: Dungeons n' Dice
description:
Roguelike dungeon and turn based combat. Beat the boss to win.

Hi! This game was made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. The theme was: Roll of the Dice.

Scope creep ate me up this time, so I ended up accomplishing a lot less than intended. I'm proud of the game nonetheless!

This game's WebGL build sometimes doesn't run on the itch.io app. Play it on itch.io's website on a browser instead! You can also download a windows build!
